```{r}
# Exponential Model
individuals <- read.csv("s", header = TRUE)
sortedindividuals <- individuals[order(individuals$tlmm),]
theta.0 <- min(sortedindividuals$wt) * 0.5
model.0 <- lm(log(sortedindividuals$wt - theta.0) ~ sortedindividuals$wt, data = sortedindividuals)  
alpha.0 <- exp(coef(model.0)[1])
beta.0 <- coef(model.0)[2]
start <- list(alpha = alpha.0, beta = beta.0, theta = theta.0)
start
expmod <- nls(sortedindividuals$wt ~ alpha * exp(beta*sortedindividuals$tlmm) + theta, data = sortedindividuals, start = start)
summary(expmod)
plot(sortedindividuals$wt ~ sortedindividuals$tlmm, pch = 16, las = 1)
lines(sortedindividuals$tlmm, predict(expmod, list(sortedindividuals$tlmm)), col = 'blue', lwd = 1)
AIC(lm01)
AIC(expmod)
```
